name: Hop Step Sing! By My Side
summary:
The first solo VRMV by Shikiri Shiishiba.
Embark on an immersive journey in the first-ever solo VRMV featuring Shikiri Shiishiba. The theme this time around is "Let’s hold hands."

Join Shikiri for a romantic seaside date under the midsummer sun. Experience the joy of clasping your hands in hers, capturing picture-perfect moments, and crafting a mesmerizing VR music video that fans will find irresistible. Elevate your experience with a special bonus ending, unlocked by bringing joy to Shikiri, along...
